dataTypeDefinitions.description: Seed rate, plant rate, etc. per area

dataTypeDefinitions.name: Applied Count Per Area (Control)

dataTypeDefinitions.name: Applied Mass Per Area (Actual)

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Granular and bulk seed applications expressed per area
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Applied Mass Per Area (Control)

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Total Count of Application.  E.g., total seeds.
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Applied Total Count

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Harvest mass per area adjusted to a standard moisture percentage
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Dry Mass Per Area

dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Total Dry Mass

dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Bale Count Per Area

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Total harvest volume, adjusted to a standard moisture percentage
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Total Dry Volume

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Granular and bulk seed applications expressed per time
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Applied Mass Per Time

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Harvest mass per time adjusted to a standard moisture percentage
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Dry Mass Per Time

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Count of harvested bales per time
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Bale Count Per Time

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Harvest volume per time. For crops sold at a standard moisture percentage, defined in that percentage(dry value).
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Yield Dry Volume Per Time

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The distance traveled by the device
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Distance Traveled

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Actual average percentage of seeds varying from defined SeedSpacing
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Seed Spacing Variation

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Force acting on a planter row unit factoring its weight, additional downforce applied and the upward force of the soil.
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Downforce Margin

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Row Cleaner pressure on a planter
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Row Cleaner Pressure (Actual)

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Row Cleaner pressure on a planter
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Row Cleaner Pressure (Target)

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Row Cleaner pressure on a planter
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Row Cleaner Pressure (Control)

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Percentage of time something is on, e.g. nozzles on a pulse width modulation sprayer
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Duty Cycle

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Amount of organic matter in soil
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Soil Organic Matter

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Reported Cation Exchange Capacity of Soil
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Soil Cation Exchange Capacity

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Amount of residue/trash in a plating furrow
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Furrow Residue

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The area used to bill for a service conducted on a field
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Billable Area

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Area recorded by a field computer that is the as-applied area including some overlap due to machine limitations and is an attribute of a work record that is operation specific and not an attribute of the boundary
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Applied Area

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The area included for reporting purposes such as insurance, green house gas, or governmental
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Reported Area

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Area calculated using a boundary or perimeter of area covered in a field operation also called GIS area
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Calculated Area

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Total area of a field that is cultivated, excluding areas such as waterways
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Arable Area

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The measured wind direction from North
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Wind Direction

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The measured relative humidity of the air
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Relative Humidity

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Defined type of an Id Source
dataTypeDefinitions.name: IdSourceType

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Nature of the date and/or time reported
dataTypeDefinitions.name: DateContext

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Defines the role a Party is performing in the given situation
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Role

items.description: A type of Reference Layer not otherwise included in this list
items.name: Other

items.description: Specific imagery to be used by the data consumer
items.name: Imagery

items.description: Comprehensive field boundaries as defined by a governmental or other external entity
items.name: Administrative Boundaries

items.description: Predefined elevation contours to be used by the data consumer
items.name: Elevation

items.description: Features used or to be used in preparing agronomic recommendations.
items.name: Management Zone

items.description: Pre-calculated farm profit data to be used by the data consumer
items.name: Profit

items.description: Features grouping ground sharing common soil taxonomic classification
items.name: Soil Type

items.description: Features grouping planted varieties for use in spatial identification during harvest
items.name: Variety Locator

items.description: General obstacles outside of the context of specific fields. For field-specific obstacles, use FieldBoundary.Obstacles.
items.name: Obstacles

items.description: Undeveloped plant embryos
items.name: Seed

items.description: Any stage of a plants other than seed used to initiate cultivation
items.name: Plant

items.description: A synthetic crop nutrition product
items.name: Fertilizer Chemical

items.description: An organic crop nutrition product
items.name: Fertilizer Organic

items.description: A weed control product
items.name: Herbicide

items.description: An insect control product
items.name: Insecticide

items.description: A fungus control product
items.name: Fungicide

items.description: A rodent control product
items.name: Rodenticide

items.description: A nematode control product
items.name: Nematicide

items.description: Any substance added to a liquid spray product to enhance its performance
items.name: Spray Adjuvant

items.description: A product to limit soil nitrogen loss
items.name: Nitrogen Stabilizer

items.description: Non-nutrient chemicals that modify plant growth
items.name: Growth Regulator

items.description: An animal nutrition product
items.name: Feed

items.description: Used for plant irrigation, animal hydration or as a spray carrier
items.name: Water

items.description: The product harvested from the Crop on a Field
items.name: Harvested Product

items.description: A product used to remove the leaves on a cultivated crop before harvest.  When used to control weeds, use Herbicide above.
items.name: Defoliant

items.description: Multiple products combined together to be applied simultaneously.   Configure Product.ProductComponents to define mix contents.
items.name: Mix

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Whether a Product is in active usage
dataTypeDefinitions.name: ProductStatus

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The physical form of a Product
dataTypeDefinitions.name: ProductForm

dataTypeDefinitions.description: How one Adapt Document relates to another.

items.description: Data in the originating document caused this document to be created.
items.name: Causal

items.description: The originating document is used to inform this document.
items.name: Contextual

items.description: This document is partially composed by the originating document.
items.name: Compositional

dataTypeDefinitions.name: DocumentRelationshipType

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Specifies how a Guidance Pattern should be extended
dataTypeDefinitions.name: GuidancePatternExtension

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Specifies the direction(s) a Guidance Pattern should be propagated
dataTypeDefinitions.name: GuidancePatternPropagationDirection

dataTypeDefinitions.description: The root type of a Data Type Definition
dataTypeDefinitions.name: DataDefinitionBaseType

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Specifies how a numeric value is to be encoded in accompanying binary data

items.description: A whole number, potentially negative
items.name: Integer

items.description: An IEEE 753 Double precision floating point value
items.name: Double

dataTypeDefinitions.name: NumericDataType

dataTypeDefinitions.description: Adapt component to which a Data Type Definition is relevant
dataTypeDefinitions.name: Scope

items.description: Applying input(s) to a Field for purposes not otherwise specified in this list, or involving individual product mixes that cross types. Examples include spreading lime, and applying a product mix with a liquid fertilizer carrier and crop protection ingredients. Seeds with crop protection treatments, however, should be classified as APPLICATION_SOWING_AND_PLANTING. Also note that where multiple products of different types are applied in a single pass, data should be configured in separate operations by type.
items.name: Application General

items.description: Applying crop nutrition input(s) to a Field.
items.name: Application Fertilizing

items.description: Introducing the seeds or other plant material into a field.
items.name: Application Sowing And Planting

items.description: Applying crop protection input(s) to a Field.
items.name: Application Crop Protection

items.description: Applying water to a Field for the purpose of irrigation.
items.name: Application Irrigation

items.description: Non-tillage activities to prepare a field for cultivation including chopping stover, picking rocks, leveling a field, building borders in flood-irrigated fields, shaping beds, etc.
items.name: Field Preparation General

items.description: Ground engaging operation to size and incorporate residue or alter the soil structure for future cultivation.
items.name: Field Preparation Tillage

items.description: In-field activities in preparation of harvest that are tracked separately, usually involving separate passes over the field from the harvest itself. Examples include swathing grain, mowing, raking and tedding hay, and removing foliage from or turning over root crops.
items.name: Harvest Pre Harvest

items.description: The specific activity of gathering the cultivated crop from its growing location converting it into a product. Examples include combining grain, chopping forage, baling hay, picking cotton or fruit.
items.name: Harvest

items.description: In-field activities following the actual harvest that are tracked separately, usually involving separate passes over the field from the harvest itself. Examples include carting grain, wrapping and hauling bales.
items.name: Harvest Post Harvest

items.description: A Field Observation activity such as scouting or soil testing.
items.name: Observation General

items.description: The activity of collecting data from the tractor or other vehicle, often alongside another Operation Type or in transport between Fields.   Examples include fuel level and oil pressure.
items.name: Vehicle Data Collection General

items.description: The entry is actively being used for new and existing data.
items.name: Valid

items.description: The entry should not be used, because it is in error or otherwise unsuitable for use. It is kept in the infrastructure for forensic / reference purposes.
items.name: Invalid

items.description: The entry should not be used to support new data. It was valid in the past, and retained to support historic data. It is not automatically assumed to have been replaced by a new, valid entry.
items.name: Retired

items.description: The entry should not be used to support new data, because there is a new item that should be used instead. The item in question was valid in the past, and is retained in order to support historic data. It is assumed to have been replaced by a new, valid entry, which it will reference.
items.name: Superseded

items.description: The entry is in a proposed state.  There is no expectation that data consumers support it until it is promoted to VALID.
items.name: Candidate
